#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	// freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int p,q;
		scanf("%d %d", &p, &q);
		int g=__gcd(p,q);
		p/=g;
		q/=g;
		if(p == 1)
		{
			while(!(q & 1))
				q>>=1;
			if(q & (q+1))
				printf("NO\n");
			else
				printf("YES\n");
		}
		else
		{
			if(!(p & (p-1)) && !(q & (q+1)) && p <= q+1)
				printf("YES\n");
			else
				printf("NO\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
